Moeldoko Buka Lowongan untuk Jadi Pegawai di KSP
07 Nov 2019, 07:39 by Friski Riana, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kepala Staf Kepresidenan Moeldoko mengatakan saat ini ia sedang melakukan rekrutmen untuk menjadi pegawai di KSP. Moeldoko mengutamakan kalangan profesional, bisa dari partai politik, relawan, organisasi kemasyarakatan, dan NGO. "Kami membuka pintu siapa pun bisa mendaftar di sini, dan kita sudah siapkan tim SDM untuk seleksinya," kata dia di Gedung Bina Graha, Jakarta, Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Selain rekrutmen pegawai KSP, juga bakal ada jabatan baru yaitu Wakil Kepala Staf Presiden. Menurut Moeldoko, Wakil KSP nantinya akan dicari dari kalangan profesional. Penunjukannya ditentukan langsung oleh Presiden Jokowi, sama seperti menunjuk wakil menteri.
Pengangkatan Wakil KSP baru ada di periode pemerintahan kedua Jokowi. Pada periode pertama, Kepala Staf Kepresidenan hanya dibantu lima deputi. Setelah ada Wakil KSP, Moeldoko mengatakan jabatan deputi tetap ada lima dan dibantu tiga staf khusus.
Adapun pembagian tugas dengan Wakil KSP akan ditentukan berdasarkan beban kerja. "Mungkin ada pertimbangan beban kerja. Nanti Wakil Staf lebih ke delivery unit, Kepala Staf lebih ke policy-nya (kebijakan). Akan kita bagi seperti itu," kata Moeldoko di Gedung Bina Graha, Jakarta, Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Moeldoko menjelaskan, delivery unit bertugas memastikan keinginan Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi dalam bentuk kebijakan bisa sampai ke unsur paling bawah dalam pemerintahan. Kebijakan itu harus terwujud dan dioperasikan. Kalau ada hambatan dalam realisasinya, maka tugas tim KSP untuk menyelesaikannya.
"Siapa aktor yg memainkan itu? BPKP, Setkab, KSP, Bappenas, ada peran-peran itu," katanya.

Moeldoko Opens Vacancies to Become Employees at KSP
Nov 7, 2019, 07:39 by Friski Riana, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Presidential Chief of Staff Moeldoko said that he was currently recruiting to become an employee at KSP. Moeldoko prioritizes professionals, from political parties, volunteers, community organizations and NGOs. "We open the door to anyone who can register here, and we have prepared an HR team for selection," he said at the Bina Graha Building, Jakarta, Thursday, November 7, 2019.
In addition to recruiting KSP employees, there will also be a new position, namely the Deputy Chief of Staff of the President. According to Moeldoko, KSP representatives will be sought from professionals. His appointment was determined directly by President Jokowi, the same as appointing a deputy minister.
The appointment of a new KSP Representative was in Jokowi's second term of government. In the first period, the Presidential Chief of Staff was only assisted by five deputies. After there was a KSP Representative, Moeldoko said that there were five deputies and were assisted by three special staff.
The division of tasks with KSP representatives will be determined based on workload. "There may be workload considerations. Later the Staff Representative will be more on the delivery unit, the Chief of Staff will be more on the policy. We will divide it like that," Moeldoko said at the Bina Graha Building, Jakarta, Thursday, November 7, 2019.
Moeldoko explained that the delivery unit was tasked with ensuring that President Joko Widodo's or Jokowi's wishes in the form of policies could reach the lowest elements in the government. The policy must be realized and operated. If there are obstacles in their realization, then the task of the KSP team is to solve them.
"Who are the actors who played it? BPKP, Setkab, KSP, Bappenas, there are roles," he said.
